Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Establishes an exemption from sales and compensating use taxes for diapers for infants, toddlers and children
Summary: Establishes an exemption from sales and compensating use taxes for diapers for infants, toddlers and children.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing an exemption from sales and compensating use taxes for diapers for infants, toddlers and children
